root.name: Samurai Warriors 3: Xtreme Legends
root.description: OverviewThe release of this expansion ended the Wii exclusivity of Samurai Warriors 3 with its PlayStation 3 counterpart Samurai Warriors 3Z including all content from the original and most of the expansion. It features Koei's Mixjoy system to import save data and continue story modes for characters within the expansion.ChangesImportation of save data from Samurai Warriors 3Three new characters with story modesStory modes for seven characters previously lacking oneUpdated character art assetsTwo new difficulty levels, essentially easy and hardTwo new modes: Challenge and Original CareerLocal and online multiplayer for Murasame Castle modeWestern ReleaseKoei has confirmed that neither version of the expansion will receive releases in North America or Europe despite online petitions. A 3DS adaptation will instead be released under the name Samurai Warriors: Chronicles which will include all content from the original game and expansion.
